homepage.title: Beranda
homepage.intro: Yuk cari tau hal yang <bold>boleh</bold> atau <bold>nggak boleh</bold> dilakuin selama masa Pembatasan Sosial Berskala Besar (PSBB)
homepage.question: Boleh nggak
common.contribution: Ada sesuatu yang kurang nggak? <anchor>bantu nambahin konten disini</anchor>
common.copyright: <link-team>Tim BolehNggak.ID</link-team>. Cuci tangan yang sering ya, guys!. Terinspirasi dari <link-can-i-go>canigo.sg</link-can-i-go>
disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content:
• You are relying on the information provided at your own risk.
  • You should consult official sources before you act on this information.
  • The authors of this site are not professionals and are not giving professional advice.
  • The content posted may be invalid over time, or inaccurate due to human error.
  • The authors of this site do not represent any organisation, nor are we doing this on behalf of any organisation.
  • Any information posted is to the best of our knowledge and not intended to defame.
  • We are not responsible for comments posted by other readers.
  • We are trying to help. Please don’t lawyer up if we made a mistake or were ill-informed. Feedback is always appreciated.
404.title: 404: Not found
404.content: You just hit a route that doesn't exist... the sadness.
privacy_policy.title: Kebijakan Privasi
about.title: About
about.content:
bolehnggak.id dibuat dengan 💕💕️ oleh Arian, Wahyu, Lintang, Rara, dan Aswin

Kita terinspirasi dari canigo.sg yang ngasi tau masyarakat Singapore tentang lokasi yang boleh dan nggak boleh dikunjungin di saat musim pandemi COVID-19.
